targets.expr: ((sum(mongodb_sys_mounts_mnt_mongodb_capacity{onyxdb_cluster=~"$cluster", instance!="$hidden_host"}) by (pod)) - (sum(mongodb_sys_mounts_mnt_mongodb_available{onyxdb_cluster=~"$cluster", instance!="$hidden_host"}) by (pod))) / (sum(mongodb_sys_mounts_mnt_mongodb_capacity{onyxdb_cluster=~"$cluster", instance!="$hidden_host"}) by (pod)) * 100
